title: I'm getting an 0xc0000005 error message whenever I try to launch league.
body: This has happened to me before trying the new client, but I reverted back to the old one; Since we're forced to use the new client it's starting to happen again. riot natural20 help me pls

replies.body:
It's possible that you need to complete a clean reinstallation of League in order to resolve the issue. Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for 'Reinstall' and 'Clean Uninstall', then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn't carry over, then reinstalls the game.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722

Let us know if your issue is resolved or not.
Thanks so much! I've managed to fix the problem using another program(AVG shredder). I think there was a problem in the file so I had to wipe out everything within it. add me on league XDDD

Welcomed, please proceed to the Fields of Justice and rejoin your fellow Summoners!! They await your return!

https://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/41/Summoner%27s_Rift_Map_Preview.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/300?cb=20170227032638 https://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/9a/Twisted_Treeline_Map_Preview.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140612032104 http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/5f/Howling_Abyss_Map_Preview.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140612032106

---

Friend request sent!

I agree with Rineyy that the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help by repairing potentially bad game files.  I also recommend going over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure the updated client is being added as an exception for any security settings you might have enabled.  Let me know if you run into any trouble along the way!
